name: Release 2.3.9 bug fix
body: Fix install script

name: Version 2.3.8 bugfix
body: After chasing systemd around to get cpu governor to be properly set on boot... I have moved this functionality to session startup in autojack

name: Version 2.3.7 bugfix
body: 2.3.6 didn't release right. this fixes that

name: version 2.3.6 bug fix
body: Add more time to let plasma settle. Try to avoid dbus loops by not having dbus calls in dbus callbacks

name: Version 2.3.5 bugfix
body: Fixes a type error in the last release that kept startup from finishing. Also detects devices that were sometimes missed. Detect and remove duplicate device records.

name: version 2.3.4 bugfix
body: More bugs... When adding extra devices, let one device finish starting before the next starts. SR detection doesn't work, use device info files instead. File change missed from last release, fixed. pulse seems to run better if the alsa devices are reinitialized before starting jack.

name: Version 2.3.3 bugfix
body: This fixes some bugs from last release as well as some bugs caused by system changes

name: Version 2.3.2 Bugfix
body: Major overhaul of various ways of doing things for stability sake. More coming next version.

name: Version 2.3.1 bugfix
body: This release fixes a hang after "Adding Bridges"

name: Release 2.3.0 bugfix
body: Python's which works different than command line which - Fix

name: Version 2.2.9 release
body: Various bug fixes and coding updates

name: Version 2.2.8 bugfix release
body: Fixes some config file conversion problems with converting older config file and for devices with names shorter than 4 charactors

name: bug fix 2.2.7
body: Another bugfix

name: release bugfix 2.2.6
body: Fix uninitialized variable error

name: 2.2.5 bugfix release
body: Fix for internal audio devices with no sample rates in info file.

name: release 2.2.4 bug fix
body: Make new file executable

name: Release 2.2.3 bugfix
body: This fixes a bug that stopped convert-studio-controls from completing

name: Fix uninitialized key error
body: As always, right after the release bugs show up.

name: Release 2.2.0
body: GUI upgrade with new look and functionality, network connections, added user script detection, extra latency setting, mixer start button choose device, try to deal with more than one usb device with same device name and increased stability. Many bug fixes including detecting plug and unplug USB devices. General code cleanup.

name: bugfix 11
body: Fix a bug where USB jack master vanishes at reboot

name: bugfix 10
body: Hopefully last pre-release

name: bugfix 9
body: Better config conversion, better default device detection, make sure a rates list exists before reading. Etc

name: bugfix 8
body: works with some of the changes from LTS to 21.10

name: Bug fix 7
body: Silly spelling and punctuation fixes

name: bug fix 6
body: Fixes extra QASmixers opening and extra devices tab all widgets inactive

name: bug fix 5
body: Alsa mixer button is now a dropdown to choose device. Convert- utility checks all values.

name: bug fix 4
body: on apply a2jmidid would not always start

name: bug fix 3
body: Fixes usb master problem

name: Bug fix 2
body: Beta for 2.2 with fixes

name: second beta release for 2.2.0
body: Bug fix

name: beta release for 2.2.0
body: A new GUI, network bridging, jack master latency setting, extra device latency setting, bug fixes

name: Bug fix
body: Second try at fixing jack port name filtering.

name: Bug fix
body:
Fixes two bugs with pulse bridging:
 - mono bridges shows more connections than requested
 - pulse bridge changes only show up properly after jack restart

name: Version 2.1.0 release
body: This release fixes a number of bugs but also re-imagines the user interface and keeps a data base of known devices.

name: bug fix
body: Make sample rate detection more universal

name: Hopefully the final bugfix before 2.1
body: fixes bugs, adds jack log file rotate

name: bugfix 2
body: Saves params as correct type instead of all strings, skips USB MIDI devices in device scan

name: bug fix 1
body: Bug fix before release

name: 2.0.21-pre release
body:
New features:
- extra devices have individual settings.
- added NSM features
- Pulse bridges may have more than 2 channels
- new config file makes index errors less likely

name: Bug fix 9
body: One channel interfaces were not being dealt with correctly for pulse-jack bridges

name: Bug fix 8
body: This a bugfix that accepts older versions of config files and coverts values to something useful

name: bugfix 7
body: "MONITOR" should never be 'none' but was sometimes so this forces it to a better value

name: Small Bugfix Release
body:
[ Len Ovens ]
- bugfix for variable used before initialized

name: more bugfixes
body:
[ Len Ovens ]
 - Add lockfile to autojack to prevent two instances running
 - Add lockfile to studio-controls to prevent two instances running
 - Depend on zita-ajbridge version 0.8.4 fixes (lp: #1889146)
 - Fix phones detection for USB phones when not plugged in
 - Catch jack error messages so they don't alarm user
 - studio-controls: Catch system signals to exit
 - up autojack signal version

name: Studio Controls 2.0.4
body:
[ Len Ovens ]
 - Fix spelling mistake
 - Fix wrong indent
 - Add "NVidia" to HDMI names
 - Add a readout of the configuration to logging

name: Studio Controls 2.0.3
body:
[ Len Ovens ]
 - Make sure to use default-device and not PCH everywhere
 - Catch pulse connection port is integer
 - no more support for older config file
 - logging should have log level set at read config file
 - autojack needs to import glob before using it - bug fix

name: Studio Controls 2.0.1
body:
[ Len Ovens ]
 - Use saved value for device instead index - bug fix
 - Log file too long re-enable log rotate - bugfix
 - dynamicly set default audio device - bugfix
 - Make sure bridges are created before connecting
 - Check if headphone device exists before checking (lp: #1888588)

name: Studio Controls 2.0.0
body:
[ Erich Eickmeyer ]
 - Add white glow to icon to increase visibilty

 [ Len Ovens ]
 - Head phone detection for PCH devices added
 - Force PCH devices to be at least 128 buffer in extra devices
 - Remove old jackdbus settings file before starting jack
 - Pulse connect port extended to all Physical ports
 - Fixed extra devices that are not sub device 0 don't work
 - Fixed Apply for input only
 - USB units with sub devices other than 0 will now auto connect
 - Added extra logging level for lots of output
 - Added better method of finding device sample rate
 - Added new depend: python3-alsaaudio
 - Detect headphone plug state on startup
 - Use direct alsa mixer manipulation
 - Add manual headphone switching
 - Add ability use outputs other than system:playback_1/2
 - general code clean up
 - Readded Firewire backend
 - Added fixes for alsa firewire devices
 - make sure extra devices work correctly with all backends
